Preterit.turoyo: mqamalli u=laḥmo 244; mqamalli aq=qayse 244; JS: Kətwolxu mede, d mašḥənitu ruḥayxu? Ǧule šaḥine kətwolxu? — XB: Naqqa səmwolan nuro w kətlan xandaq kḥəfrina. Səmlan nuro bu xandaq, mqamarlan, kətwolan fako d laḥmo ṣafro
translations: ich habe das Holz auf dem Ofen getrocknet

'JS: Did you have anything to warm yourself? Warm clothes? — XB: Sometimes we made ourselves a fire, and we had a <...> that we dug out. We made ourselves a fire and roasted... we had a bit of morning-bread" (XB 945)
